skills.list_mods: Climb +3, Drive +9, Intimidate +1, Jump +3, Listen +4, Repair +5, Search +2, Speak Language +1, Spot +6, Survival +2, Swim +2

item.name: Backpack
item.contents: 5 lbs., 1 Formal Outfit, 1 Stealth Outfit, 1 9mm Bullets, 50 pack

item.name: Backpack
item.contents: 5 lbs., 1 Formal Outfit, 1 Stealth Outfit, 1 9mm Bullets, 50 pack

feat.name: Alertness
feat.description: The character gets a +2 bonus on all Listen checks and Spot checks

feat.name: Brawl
feat.description: When making an unarmed attack, the character receives a +1 competence bonus on attack rolls, and the character deals nonlethal damage equal to 1d6 + his or her Strength modifier

feat.name: Improved Brawl
feat.description: When making an unarmed attack, the character receives a +2 competence bonus on his or her attack roll, and the character deals nonlethal damage equal to 1d8 + the character's Strength modifier

feat.name: Personal Firearms Proficiency
feat.description: The character can fire any personal firearm without penalty

feat.name: Surface Vehicle Operation (Heavy Wheeled)
feat.description: Select a class of surface vehicle (heavy wheeled, powerboat, sailboat, ship, or tracked). The character is proficient at operating that class of vehicle

feat.name: Vehicle Expert
feat.description: The character gets a +2 bonus on all Drive checks and Pilot checks

feat.name: Simple Weapons Proficiency
feat.description: The character makes attack rolls with simple weapons normally

character.weapon_proficiencies: Air Pistol, Air Rifle, AKM/AK-47, Barrett Light Fifty, Beam Sword, Benelli 121 M1, Beretta 92F, Beretta 93R, Beretta M3P, Blowgun, Brass Knuckles, Brawl, Browning BPS, Cleaver, Club, Colt Double Eagle, Colt M1911, Colt Python, Concussion Rifle, Concussion Rod, Crossbow, Cryonic Rifle, Crystal Pistol, Derringer, Desert Eagle, Disintegrator, Falcon .45, Flamethrower, Flare Gun, Gauntlet, Glock 17, Glock 20, Gravity Snare, Heavy Mace, High Frequency Sword, HK G3, HK MP5, HK MP5K, HK PSG1, Javelin, Ketch-all Pole, Knife, Laser Optics, Laser Pistol, Laser Rifle, Laser Sniper Rifle, Light Mace, Lightning Gun, M-60, M16A2, M4 Carbine, MAC Ingram M10, Metal Baton, Mini-Grenade Launcher, Mini-Rocket Launcher, Mossberg, OICW Assault Rifle, Paint Ball Gun, Pathfinder, Pepper Spray, Pistol Whip, Plasma Pistol, Plasma Rifle, Pulse Rifle, Punching Dagger, Quarterstaff, Rail Gun, Remington 700, Rifle Butt, Ruger Service-Six, S and W M29, Sap, Sawed-Off Shotgun, Shortspear, Sickle, SITES M9, Skorpion, Slingshot, Sonic Beam, Speargun, Spiked Club, Steyr AUG, Sticky Foam Sprayer, Stun Baton, Stun Gun, Super Watergun, TACMIL Sniper Rifle, Tangler Gun, Taser, TEC-9, Tonfa, Twin thunder machine gun, Unarmed Strike, Uzi, Walther PPK, Water Cannon, Whip, Winchester 94
